item.title: CloudFormation
item.description: About CloudF­orm­ation enables the user to design & provision AWS infras­tru­cture deploy­ments predic­tably & repeat­edly Documentation User Guide Terminology Component Description Templates The JSON or YAML text file that contains the instructions for building out the AWS environment Stacks The entire environment described by the template and created, updated, and deleted as a single unit StackSets AWS CloudFormation StackSets extends the functionality of stacks by enabling you to create, update, or delete stacks across multiple accounts and regions with a single operation Change Sets A summary of proposed changes to your stack that will allow you to see how those changes might impact your existing resources before implementing them Template The main sections in a CloudFormation template:
